description:
Enjoy a delightful 3-hour adventure featuring two captivating snorkeling stops. First, explore the iconic shipwreck "Antilla", a fascinating relic resting beneath the azure waters, brimming with tales of maritime history and intrigue. Next, head to Boca Catalina reef, known for its colorful fish and vibrant coral reefs in clear waters.

This experience includes: open bar, snacks (Tuna or Chicken wrap, tropical fruit), snorkel equipment, rope swing, and a spectacular water slide. Our friendly crew will teach you to snorkel if needed. We suggest to wear casual clothing.

Delphi Watersports is located in front of the Hyatt Regency towel hut on the beach. Ask for Jhon or Olga.

additionalInfo.description: Public transportation options are available nearby
Suitable for all physical fitness levels

Special instructions: The credit card holder has to be present at the time of the check-in and bring a picture I.D. or copy of an ID card, driver’s license; or passport. The check in will be at Delphi Watersports located in front of the Hyatt Regency towel hut on the beach. As for Olga or John.
Note: the catamaran can accommodate up to 42 passengers in total. Bookings over 15 passengers can be done by making multiple bookings.

cancellationPolicy.description: For a full refund, cancel at least 24 hours before the scheduled departure time.

activityInfo.description:
Check in location:
Delphi Watersports is located in front of the Hyatt Regency towel hut on the beach. Ask for Olga or John.
Cruise Description:

After a smooth sail for about 20 miutes you will reach the second largest shipwreck in the Caribbean the famous WWII German freighter "Antilla" that almost touches the surface. We will stay there for snorkeling for about 45 minutes. From there we will go to the nearby shallow reef at Boca Catalina where you can snorkel again in between many colorful fish. After about 40 minutes the crew will call everyone back on board and you can particpate in our optional rope swing and also use the water slide. The crew will part the light lunch and during the entire trip the included open bar will be available to get some great tropical cocktails, juices and soft drinks. Afterwards we will sail back along the scenic Aruba coast line to Palm Beach.

What's Included:

* 2 Snorkeling Stops: WWII German shipwreck ”Antilla” and Boca Catalina bay with it's beautiful reef where you see lots of colorful fish.
* Desinfected snorkeling equipment
* Open bar with cocktails
* Light Lunch
* Caribbean music
* Rope swing
* Water slide

description: Who doesn't want to spend half the day on Aruba's gorgeous turquoise waters? This 4-hour sail includes snorkel gear and visits to three snorkel spots: The Antilla shipwreck, Catalina Bay, and Malmok Bay. It also features a Caribbean-inspired lunch buffet and an open bar with cocktails, sodas, and juices.

inclusions.otherDescription: Use of snorkel equipment and instruction (instruction on request)

exclusions.otherDescription: Round-trip Transportation (available for an added cost, contact local operator after booking)

If you have children in your group that cannot swim, you have to inform Red Sail directly to arrange a mandatory life vest for the child while on board

cancellationPolicy.description: For a full refund, cancel at least 24 hours before the scheduled departure time.

itineraryItems.description: Snorkeling is one of the best and easiest ways to discover Aruba's Underwater Marine life. Board one of Red Sail Aruba’s luxury catamarans to take you to three of Aruba's best snorkel spots; Boca Catalina, the Antilla shipwreck, and Malmok. Refuel and refresh with a delicious Caribbean lunch buffet and a fully stocked open bar.

Travelers will discover the Antilla Shipwreck, among the Caribbean's largest underwater wrecks, during the Aruba Lunch and Snorkel Half-Day Cruise. Resting in crystal-clear waters off Aruba's coast, this WWII German freighter offers a captivating backdrop for snorkelers, with its hauntingly beautiful remains bustling with vibrant marine life, like sea anemones, tube sponges, coral formations and fish including parrotfish, angelfish, southern stingrays, yellowtail snapper, queen flounder, trumpet fish, and more.

You will also be exploring the vibrant MalMok Reef. This stunning reef, is renowned for its crystal-clear waters and abundance of colorful marine life, making it another snorkeler's paradise. Expect an unforgettable underwater adventure as you swim among tropical fish and explore the captivating coral formations.

Your first snorkeling stop is shallow Catalina Bay, ideal for beginners or those who need time to practice using the snorkel equipment—instruction included. A swimming ladder and fun waterslide make it easy for passengers to get into the water. View colorful fish and corals in their growing stages before continuing on to one of Aruba’s most famous shipwreck sites: the SS Antilla.

description: The Luxury Lagoon Cruise allows you to cruise along Aruba’s Southern Coast aboard our Teak Schooner. While cruising, join us by the bar for a cool refreshment or lay down on one of our lounges to unwind and take in the sight. Some may also enjoy sunbathing on the deck while sipping Mimosas and/or making a splash while rope-swinging. After a refreshing swim or adventurous guided snorkel or kayak exploration, enchant your taste buds as our onboard chef prepares a delightful lunch grilled on sight accompanied by some cool Caribbean music and refreshing hand-crafted cocktails. As we sail back, hang loose & delight in the scenic beauty Aruba grants to us all.

description: Have a warm Aruban welcome on board of a beautiful 65-foot catamaran, the Arusun, and spend the most fun, relaxing 2.5 hours exploring the Caribbean Sea. There is no better way to explore the marine life of Aruba then on this extremely fit catamaran, which has sailed the world once. The ocean is your playground!

inclusions.description: Unlimited Open Bar includes: whisky, rum, vodka, juices, soda, and water

activityInfo.description:
After check in at our desk, our crew will shuttle you with a zodiac rubber boat from our Pier to the Catamaran.

A smooth nice sailing on a never to overcrowded catamaran that has become the best design for commercial sailing. She has lovely relaxing marine nets in the front, a bar and seats on the shady part of the back.

Once you're on board your Captain for the day will welcome you warmly before starting the safety briefing and hoisting the sails.

After departure our first Mate is ready to serve you.

productOptions.description: 2.5 Hours of Sailing Adventure with 2 Famous Snorkeling Stops like The Antilla Shipwreck and Boca Catalina Bay.

title: Tropical Sailing Experience with BBQ Lunch or BBQ Dinner in Aruba

start.description: our address is Bucutiweg #34 or if using GPS, it is easier to locate The Fish House Restaurant at Varadero Marina as we are located on the same property.

travelerPickup.additionalInfo:
Dear Guests,

As part of your upcoming Rockabeach Tours experience, we want to ensure that your pickup arrangements are smooth and convenient.

Pickup Times
For your convenience, pickup times are standardized for all hotels:
* Morning Sailing: between 8:15 AM – 8:30 AM
* Afternoon Sailing: between 1:45 PM – 2:00 PM

Important: Please be outside and ready within the time frame. If you are not present when transportation arrives, the vehicle will depart, and you will need to make your own way to our office by taxi to join the tour.

Should you have any questions or concerns, please don’t hesitate to reach out. We’re here to make your journey with us enjoyable and hassle-free.

description: Discover Aruba's Beauty Embark on the Tropical Sailing Experience from Varadero Marina Aruba, with morning and afternoon sails available. Cruise past the picturesque Spanish Lagoon, and the Aruba Desalination Plant. Indulge in a delightful lunch or early dinner at Mangel Halto Reef, where thrilling snorkeling awaits. Relish the beauty of a captivating sunset.

inclusions.description: Ask for Vegan, Vegetarian, Pescatarian and Gluten Free Options
BBQ lunch with morning sail and BBQ dinner with afternoon sail. Premium open bar.

additionalInfo.description: Infants and small children can ride in a pram or stroller
Service animals allowed
Infants are required to sit on an adult’s lap
Suitable for all physical fitness levels
We only serve alcoholic drinks for travelers 18 years old and above. Minor travelers below 18 years old will be served non-alcoholic drinks.

cancellationPolicy.description: For a full refund, cancel at least 24 hours before the scheduled departure time.

itineraryItems.description: Pickup form your hotel or Cruiseship Terminal with our tour bus or van and drive to The Varadero Aruba Marina & Boatyard to embark on our sailboat.
Gracefully glide past the picturesque Spanish Lagoon. Let the gentle breeze and stunning vistas captivate your senses, creating timeless memories against the backdrop of Aruba's serene waters.
Gracefully sail past the iconic Flamingo Island. Marvel at the vibrant hues of the Caribbean sky mirrored in the crystal-clear waters, creating a breathtaking scene worthy of a postcard.

Exhilarating adventure aboard our sailboat as we journey to the mesmerizing Mangel Halto Reef for an unforgettable snorkeling experience. Immerse yourself in the vibrant underwater world, encountering colorful marine life amidst the coral gardens of Aruba's pristine waters.

After exploring the stunning reefs of Mangel Halto, you will sail back toward the Varadero Aruba Marina & Boatyard, gliding along Aruba’s picturesque shoreline as the crew ensures a smooth and relaxing return experience.

As our unforgettable sailboat journey draws to a close, we navigate back to the tranquil Varadero Marina dock, where each wave whispers tales of our memorable adventure. Reflect on the beauty of the Caribbean horizon as we bid farewell to the open sea, carrying with us the timeless essence of Aruba's maritime charm.

productOptions.title: Tropical Sailing Experience with BBQ Lunch or BBQ Dinner in Aruba

title: Premium Catamaran Morning Sail: Snorkeling, Mimosas and Brunch

start.description: Your tour departs from the Octopus Aruba beach hut which is located on Palm Beach behind the Holiday Inn. Once you reach the Holiday Inn Hotel, please walk through the lobby until you reach the beach area. Make a left on the footpath and you will see us on your right.

end.description: Your tour departs from the Octopus Aruba beach hut which is located on Palm Beach behind the Holiday Inn. Once you reach the Holiday Inn Hotel, please walk through the lobby until you reach the beach area. Make a left on the footpath and you will see us on your right.

description:
Begin your day with freshly prepared appetizers, refreshing juice, and a sparkling mimosa as you set sail on the crystal-clear waters of the Caribbean. Welcome aboard Octopus, where we’ll take you to two of Aruba’s best snorkel spots.

What makes our tour truly unique? Relax in your cushioned lounge seat with uninterrupted sea views, no one sits behind you, ensuring space and privacy. Unlike other tours, there’s no need to stand in line for drinks. Our attentive crew serves cocktails directly to you from our open bar, featuring the famous Aruba Arriba, spirits like rum, gin, vodka, whiskey, and, of course, mimosas.

Throughout the journey, enjoy fresh appetizers served right to your seat, allowing you to fully unwind. With an intimate group size of just 34 guests, every guest is treated like a friend. Plus, each receives a high-quality Octopus Aruba souvenir as a keepsake of this unforgettable experience. Join us for a morning adventure you’ll treasure forever!

inclusions.otherDescription: Use of snorkel equipment and instruction

additionalInfo.description: Public transportation options are available nearby
Suitable for all physical fitness levels
Please bring a towel and suncream
Please advise any specific dietary requirements at time of booking
Children are welcome and infants under two cruise free

Boarding takes place via a spacious shuttle boat (for up to 15 people) that transports guests to the catamaran. This shuttle, like all our vessels, undergoes inspection every six months to ensure safety and quality. From the beach hut (where check-in takes place), it’s a short 30-meter/ 98 foot ride to the catamaran. This area of the sea is as calm as a lake, with little to no waves throughout the year

cancellationPolicy.description: For a full refund, cancel at least 24 hours before the scheduled departure time.

itineraryItems.description: You’ll sail to two of Aruba’s best snorkel stops with our experienced captain and crew. The first location is the famous shipwreck ‘Antilla’, where you’ll spend 45 minutes of exploring. The Antilla sank more than 60 years ago and remains completely intact. Legend says the ship is a 1939 German freighter likely carried supplies during WW2 and was caught in the Dutch waters following Germany’s invasion of Holland. Explore the 400 foot Antilla easily and safe with guidance of our experienced crew.

You’ll sail to two of Aruba’s best snorkel stops with our experienced captain and crew. The second stop of this charter are the shallow waters of Catalina Bay. You can spot angel fish, damsel fish, octopuses, sea fans and coral. New to snorkeling? Not a problem. Our captain and first made wil patiently work with you to make sure you have safe and enjoyable snorkel adventure.

Sail along Aruba’s beautiful coastline. The warm, clear, blue water of the Caribbean paired with hundreds of species of tropical fish and coral will be a feast for your eyes. If this sounds too good to be true, it’s not.

Our attentive crew will bring drinks directly to you, whether it’s a refreshing Aruba Arriba, spirits like rum, gin, vodka, whiskey, or a non-alcoholic mocktail.

With our intimate group size of just 34 guests, every customer is treated like a friend. Plus, as a special memento, each guest takes home a high-quality Octopus Aruba souvenir. description: Enjoy an afternoon snorkeling cruise in Aruba aboard this 85-foot teak Schooner. Visit three great sites: Malmok Reefs, Boca Catalina and the WWII shipwreck, Antilla! You can choose to swim and snorkel at two of the sites and you will have time to channel your Johhny Depp for some cool rope swinging at the third site. For your comfort find ample shade and seating under the large canopy by the bar or stretch out on the teak deck for sunning. This tour includes an open bar, a full-set snorkeling gear and lots of fun with the ship's rope swing!

description: Sun, sailing and snorkeling — the perfect way to spend an afternoon in Aruba. On this 3-hour tour, cruise the Caribbean waters aboard a catamaran and kick your fins to explore two rich snorkeling sites. First, swim near angelfish and other colorful marine life in calm Catalina Bay. Then head on to Antilla Shipwreck, one of the island's most famous snorkeling spots, where angelfish, yellowtail snapper, stingrays and morays swirl around the remnants of the WWII freighter. Bonus: An open bar, snacks are included.

inclusions.otherDescription: Luxury catamaran tour with 2 snorkel stops

additionalInfo.description: Infants and small children can ride in a pram or stroller
Public transportation options are available nearby
Suitable for all physical fitness levels
Please inform supplier if you have children in your group that cannot swim, in order to arrange a mandatory life jacket for them while on board.
Contact supplier directly to arrange a transfer to the pier, transfers are on request and based on availability and are only available for major hotels not in walking distance of our pier.
Please bring: Swim suit, towel, sunscreen, camera

cancellationPolicy.description: For a full refund, cancel at least 24 hours before the scheduled departure time.

itineraryItems.description: Snorkeling is one of the best and easiest ways to discover Aruba's Underwater Marine life. Board one of Red Sail Aruba’s luxury catamarans to take you to two of Aruba's best snorkel spots; the Antilla shipwreck and Boca Catalina. Refuel and refresh with bite-sized appetizers and a fully stocked open bar.

Located off the northwestern tip of Aruba, small and secluded Catalina Bay offers placid, transparent waters, the ideal spot to refresh or learn snorkeling skills. After a safety briefing, slip on provided snorkeling gear and jump in! 

Dip your mask underwater and marvel at a wonderland of tropical fish. In the shallow waters reaching a depth of approx. 15 feet (5 meters), you may see queen angelfish, schools of blue parrotfish and damselfish swimming around nearby coral and sea fans.

The shipwreck now provides a thriving home for a diverse array of marine life. Put on your snorkeling mask, kick your fins and explore the waters averaging 30 to 50 feet (9 to 15 meters) in visibility. The wreck begins at approximately 10 feet below sea level.  

Check out the starboard side of the ship, wholly crusted with thick coral. Hover over the forecastle and watch yellowtail snapper, butterfly fish, southern stingrays and green morays glide around the upper deck. Admire star, white-tipped fire and brain corals, and catch glimpses of barracudas, bluehead wrasse and schools of white grunts. 

After a leisurely snorkel at the shipwreck, relax aboard the catamaran and sip more offerings from the open bar while we sail back to Palm Beach.

title: Iconic Aruba Sail and Snorkel Experience
